meanings.definition: The act of covering a building with weatherboards.
meanings.sent1: The weatherboardings on the house protect it from rain and wind.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers finished the weatherboardings on the new building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the weatherboardings as a ladder to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the empty house, bouncing off the weatherboardings.
meanings.sent5: The bright red weatherboardings made the house stand out on the street.

meanings.definition: The material used for weatherboarding a building.
meanings.sent1: The weatherboardings were made of sturdy wood to withstand the elements.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter selected the best weatherboardings for the restoration project.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the weatherboardings were swords in their imaginary battle.
meanings.sent4: The old barn creaked in the wind, its weatherboardings groaning with age.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh paint lingered on the weatherboardings of the farmhouse.
